content: Heya! I've been hoping to adjust our code that's using wasmtime-go to the changes around the epoch-based interruptions vs using the interrupt handle, but I can't seem to find a 0.36.0 release of wasmtime-go yet. Am I missing something? Or is it just that nobody got around to it yet? (Sorry for nagging...)

oh sorry I've meant to get around to this but have forgotten so far. It's a bit tricky since I need to update where the binaries are pulled from, I'll try to get to it today though thanks for the reminder!
Stephan Renatus has marked this topic as resolved.
